official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present a gold medal to the widow of Joe Louis.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present a gold medal to the widow of Joe Louis in recognition of her husband's contributions to the nation as heavyweight boxing champion of the world.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present a gold medal to the widow of Joe Louis.
